TEXT.TITLE: Vladimir Lenin
TEXT.PARAGRAPH:
Vladimir Ilyich Ulyanov
Vladimir Ilyich Ulyanov Vladimir Ilyich Ulyanov himself Vladimir Lenin Vladimir Lenin himself _ he he himself who who himself
([Russian: Владимир Ильич Ульянов], better known by the alias Lenin (Ленин)) (April 22, 1870 – January 24, 1924), was a Russian revolutionary, a communist politician, the main leader of the October Revolution, the first head of Soviet Russia, and the primary theorist of the ideology that has come to be called Leninism, which is a variant of Marxism.
